adHeader: Recording Studio Save 50% off Normal Rates
adDetails: Full Professional Class A Pre-Amps / Compressors / Over $4,000 Vocal Mic / Rupert Neve Pre's / Focus Rite Pre's / Analog Synths / literally includes everything you could ever want in a studio. Includes a Mixing/Mastering Engineer with Bachelors Degree From SFSU in Audio Production. Latest Gear and Latest Techniques in production. Normal Rates are $40/hr, mention this ad and get 50% off and pay only $20/hr. to welcome new artists. Limited Time Offer expires 06/15/2014. Not to be combined with any other offer. Minimum 3 Hours. Take your music to the next level!! Call show contact info www.redeyerecordingstudios.com
